name: Melanie's Literature of Biology and Zoology

description:
Disclaimer: THIS MOD IS BASED IN MLiELG AND NOT IN MLO

Message to Kracc: If you want me to remove this mod, just tell me and I'll remove it.

This is a port of Melanie's Literature in Education Literary Grammar to Alex Basics.

ABiBaZ by S-Pider Dev, and MLiELG was made by Kracc/KrazzersKits.

Alt links: Gamejolt DL
